DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Gadobutrol 1.0 Molar ( Gadovist ) Breast MRI
DOC.criteria: Recent histologically proven diagnosis breast cancer obtain XRay Mammography ( XRM ) breast ( accord American College Radiology [ ACR ] perform longer 6 week prior enrollment study ) refer contrastenhanced Magnetic Resonance Mammography ( MRM ) prior surgery breast . If female , digital XRM require follow criterion meet : 1. patient young 50 year ; 2. patient heterogeneously extremely dense breast ; 3. postmenopausal ( postmenopause define least 12 month prior inclusion without menstruation ) . If female childbearing potential , MRM perform 714th day menstrual cycle . Has estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) value > /= 60 mL/min/1.73m^2 derive serum creatinine result within 2 week prior study enrollment . Is female patient pregnant lactating Has contraindication MRM examination ( e.g . metal implant , phobia ) use gadoliniumcontaining contrast agent . Has receive contrast agent within 24 hour prior study MRM , schedule receive contrast agent within 24 hour study MRM . Has severe cardiovascular disease ( e.g. , know long QT syndrome , acute myocardial infarction [ < 14 day ] , unstable angina , congestive heart failure New York Heart Association class IV ) acute stroke ( < 48 hour ) ) . Has acute renal insufficiency severity due hepatorenal syndrome perioperative liver transplantation period acute chronic moderate severe renal insufficiency ( glomerular filtration rate < 60 mL/min/1.73m^2 ) . Has receive chemotherapy hormonal therapy breast cancer within 6 month . Has receive hormone replacement therapy within 4 week prior study drug administration . Is schedule likely require surgery and/or biopsy time period 24 hour follow study drug application Has prior excisional biopsy breast surgery le 6 month enrollment XRM study MRM
